title: Possible reform to the leave buster system
body:
As a player who extremely rarely leaves a match intentionally, i get put into the leavebuster queue almost exclusively for the reason that my internet drops out or refuses to connect to riots servers.
My suggestion as a change to the system is to grant another alternative to waiting an extended period of time to join que. 
A way this could be done is wait 5 days or play the 5 games. Make it so that if the player hasn't got the time to wait 5-20 minutes to join queue they can still serve the punishment in a different way. Unlike a ban they can still play if they want to but can just wait it out if their lives don't allow for them to sit and wait to be allowed to join queue.

Edit: Not sure if player behavior is the best category to post this in but sounds right to me so correct me if I'm wrong.

replies.body: I'm not sure I understand what youree saying the punishment should be

So Instead of waiting for 20min to join a queue 5 times you could not play matchmade for 5 days or a week and leave buster will be lifted. I'm not referring to having one or the other I mean to have both options available to the player should they end up in leavebuster
